headline: PepsiCo (PEP) Earns Buy Rating from DZ Bank as Revenue Tops Estimates
summary: PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) is included among the 15 Best DRIP Stocks to Own Right Now. On October 21, DZ Bank analyst​ Axel Herli​nghaus upgraded PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) from Hold to Buy and set a pri‍ce target of $167, citing confidence in the company’s outlook, according to a report by The Fly. PepsiCo, Inc. (NASDAQ:PEP) deli‍vered […]
